subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Among the hundreds of first-time Olympians in London in July, perhaps none will have come as far as Mitchell Watt, 24, a favorite for the gold medal in the men's long jump.
snippet: Among the hundreds of first-time Olympians in London in July, perhaps none will have come as far as Mitchell Watt, 24, a favorite for the gold medal in the men's long jump.
